page.topic: Open a UX component to Edit Current Record in Grid, or add a new Record
page.description: Open an UX component in a pop-up window, or in a DIV on the current page, to edit the current row in a Grid component or to enter a new record. (Only new Ajax Components can be opened. Old Dialogs in V10 and earlier are not supported.)

section.description: Used with the Grid and UX component
